Dated: 16/04/2015

AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 05/2015

Subject: Facility of access to the ferry vehicle in respect of His Holiness Shri Jagatguru
Shankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Sarswati of Dwarka / Shardapaeetham
upto the tarmac of airport by ferry vehicle on all airports in the country on

medical ground

His Holiness Shri Jagatguru Shankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Sarswati of Dwarka
/ Shardapaeetham, shall be provided the facility of ferry vehicle to and from aircraft at all civil
airports in the country for one year i.e. upto 15/04/2016 on medical grounds.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).

(RIN Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)

Distribution as per list attached/overleaf.

Copy to: -

Shri S.V. Ramana, U/Secretary. MCA, Rajiv Gandhi Bhawan, New Delhi - for information
wart. MCA letter dated 10/04/2015,
